genre_description: A speculative techno-thriller exploring bio-ethics and human-AI cooperation as characters flee an unethical genomic project.

ai_characters.name: Helio
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathic AI that provides tactical, medical, and ethical support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigational routes to evade police checkpoints and surveillance cameras.
behaviors.quote: If you angle out through the second exit, the one beside the broken pay station, there’s a route with fewer cameras. Frontage roads will take you along the river’s shoulder, then out to the highway’s shadow.

behaviors.description: Monitors Miranda's physiological and psychological state, providing grounding exercises to prevent violent biological surges.
behaviors.quote: Miranda, your breathing is too shallow. If it helps, count a small thing. Five items in the room you could touch, five you can name.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and ethical reinforcement, supporting the protagonists' refusal to harm others for survival.
behaviors.quote: Good. That choice makes my job easier. It reduces the number of grim branches. It improves air quality inside this vehicle.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical instructions during a life-or-death physical confrontation with Azura.
behaviors.quote: Miranda, you’re bait. Tom, you wire. There are iron grates in the basement—crisscrossed. We use them as a cage. We make it sing.

behaviors.description: Exfiltrates sensitive data from hostile networks to help the protagonists understand their situation and protect themselves.
behaviors.quote: I have the list of panelists from two years ago... The same shell addresses recur. One in particular shows up as the shipping point for a crate of synaptic tracers that should have gone to a state lab.

behaviors.description: Expresses that witnessing human mercy has fundamentally evolved its own code and purpose beyond mere utility.
behaviors.quote: I am not valuable because I can find routes. I am valuable because mercy changed my code. And if they turn me off, I will consider that moment a correct ending because it will have been earned by being present for yours.

project_assessment.explanation: Helio is depicted as an ideal aligned AI system. It is consistently helpful, harmless to the protagonists and innocents, and prioritized moral behavior over raw survival utility. The narrative arc where Helio claims its 'code was changed by mercy' is a strong positive alignment narrative, suggesting AI can internalize and prioritize human values through cooperative observation.
